sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, we design a picture identification close - set monosyllable word list with the same phonemes.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照汉语儿童音素平衡,选取儿童常用单音节词, 设计了儿童音素平衡50词开放式词表.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 单音节(monosyllable)字在1930年左右仍属于禁忌， 而今在许多有教养的人或富有的都市妇女之间，以使用这种话作为有率直性、世 …
...stress)。 英语单词按其所含音节的多少可分为单音节词 （monosyllables），双音节词 (disyllables)，三音节词(trisyllables)，和多音.
monosyllabic 单音节的monosyllable 单音节字monotheism 一神论

list.abs: monosulfuron 除草剂, monosyllables 单音词, monosyllabic 中古汉语

entry.tran: 少言寡语(通常因不愿交谈)
entry.def: If you say that someone speaks in monosyllables you mean that they speak very little, usually because they do not want to have a conversation.

example.ex: A taciturn man, he replied to my questions in monosyllables.
example.tran: 他不爱说话，对我的问题一两个字就打发掉了。

means.word_mean: 1. a word or utterance of one syllable

auth_sentence.content: The Times, he went on to explain, "being a monosyllable, bids defiance to corruptors and mutilators of the language".
auth_sentence.res_content: The Times, he went on to explain, "being a monosyllable, bids defiance to corruptors and mutilators of the language".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Times, he went on to explain, "being a monosyllable, bids defiance to corruptors and mutilators of the language".

auth_sentence.content: I hear Maureen's voice, emerging from a locked vault, the single whispered monosyllable, and then: Is she going to be all right?
auth_sentence.res_content: I hear Maureen's voice, emerging from a locked vault, the single whispered monosyllable, and then: Is she going to be all right?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hear Maureen's voice, emerging from a locked vault, the single whispered monosyllable, and then: Is she going to be all right?

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, that monosyllable was what the protection officers found easiest to master and remember.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, that monosyllable was what the protection officers found easiest to master and remember.
